title: Flow Blockchain Unveils Crescendo Network Upgrade with EVM and Cadence 1.0 in Fact Friday - "The Defiant"
image_alt: Flow Blockchain Unveils Crescendo Network Upgrade with EVM and Cadence 1.0 in Fact Friday
description: Flow Blockchain has announced the Crescendo Network upgrade, which includes significant updates such as EVM on Flow and Cadence 1
